value.name: Columbus agrees to pay $10M to family of Andre Hill, an unarmed Black man killed by police
value.description: Columbus has agreed to pay $10 million to the family of Andre Hill, an unarmed Black man fatally shot by former police officer Adam Coy in December.

value.name: City settles Andre Hill shooting that resulted in an officer being fired
value.description: The city of Columbus has agreed to pay $10 million to the family of André Hill, an unarmed Black man fatally shot by former Columbus police officer Adam Coy in December, City Attorney Zach Klein announced Friday.

value.description: I’m somewhat surprised that we still haven’t reached the point where legislators are pushing police reform. Even if they’re unmoved by the loss of life, you would think they would grow tired of paying out millions over unnecessary deaths.
